title: Downgrade Subscription Plan
description: A customer wants to downgrade from the 'Enterprise' plan to the 'Pro' plan to save costs.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and their current plan.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the customer is on the 'Enterprise' plan.

tasks.description: Explain which features the customer will lose by downgrading (e.g., SSO, advanced security).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the impact of the downgrade.

tasks.description: Process the plan downgrade, effective at the next renewal date.
